conbody.p: The DITA topic templates include the following metadata fields to help searching and categorizing topics. Using these metadata fields is optional but recommended.

row.entry: The author (owner) of the topic. Helps to identify the internal subject matter expert in distributed teams.
The products the topic applies on. Use the product abbreviations. If multiple products apply, use ; as the separator character instead of a blank space.

The last product version the topic was updated for. Helps to identify recently changed topics and old topics that were not updated since a while. Enter the product version as the value of the release attribute.
If a product contains multiple standalone components, list here the component the topic applies on.
If the topic is related to a specific product requirement, feature or change request, provide its ID in this field.
